channel.title: Tag2 on Welcome to Ben Baur
channel.description: Recent content in Tag2 on Welcome to Ben Baur

item.title: HUGO Site Configuration
item.description:
Site COnfiguation

defaultContentLanguage = “en” # current only supported ’en’ and ‘zh-hans’, see the ‘i18n’ folder [params] defaultCover = ‘https://example.com/cover.jpg' # default cover image for post not setting cover email = ‘floyd.li@outlook.com’ # the email address display in the footer [params.algolia] # Algolia search configuration enabled = true # enable Algolia search appId = ‘YOUR_KEY’ # appid for Algolia search appKey = ‘YOUR_APP_KEY’ # appkey for Algolia search searchIndex = ‘YOUR_INDEX’ # index for Algolia search [[params.css]] # custom css stylesheet, you can add one or more, url is relative in ‘static’ folder url = ‘css1.css’ [[params.css]] url = ‘css2.css’ [[params.js]] # custom javascript, you can add one or more, url is relative in ‘static’ folder url = ‘js1.js’ [[params.js]] url = ‘js2.js’ [[params.socialMedia]] # custom social links display in the footer, you can add one or more name = ‘Github’ url = ‘https://github.com/floyd-li' [[params.socialMedia]] name = ‘Twitter’ url = ‘https://twitter.com/some-one' [[params.blogroll]] # blogroll links display in the footer, you can add one or more name = ‘Apple’ url = ‘https://Apple.com/' [[params.blogroll]] name = ‘Google’ url = ‘https://Google.com/'
